TEXT.TITLE: FREEDOM FEDERAL <FRFE> SETS INITIAL PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY:
Freedom Federal Savings Bank said it voted its first cash dividend of 10 cts a share, payable April 10, record March 31. The 1987 annual dividend will be 40 cts a share, it said.
Reuter
